thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Freshpet Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Freshpet Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.04
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Freshpet Inc:
* FRESHPET, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 SALES ROSE 19.5 PERCENT TO $40.7 MILLION * FOR FULL YEAR 2018, SEES NET SALES MORE THAN $185.0 MILLION
* FOR FULL YEAR 2018, SEES ADJUSTED. EBITDA MORE THAN $20.0 MILLION
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.05, REVENUE VIEW $41.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $187.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
